alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Grant County through 245 PM MDT... At 215 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pinos Altos, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Silver City, Tyrone, Bayard, Santa Clara, Fort Bayard, Arenas Valley and Little Walnut Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
